Daam
Daam
The Daam Center is a non-profit organization founded in 2014 with the aim of enhancing mental health in the community and supporting youth's ability to address and resolve behavioral disorders. It also aims to support the promotion of mental health in society and enhance the ability of young people to address and resolve behavioral deviations and disorders. The center is committed to providing effective educational, therapeutic, rehabilitation, and training services in the field of mental health. It strives to elevate services directed towards individuals with behavioral deviations and disorders in society and to develop highly qualified personnel in the field of behavioral and cognitive therapy.
